cz.muni.fi.pb138.cv.service

Interface CvService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CvServiceImpl, MockedCvServiceImpl

    public interface CvService
    Service for CVs. Every method is duplicated, depending on whether it deals with CV in JSON or XML format. Frontend uses only JSON, so we need to abstract it from XML conversion. CVs are stored in XML and all the logic is in XML so every method dealing with JSON will first convert the JSON to XML and then delegate work to XML method.
    Author:
    Zuzana

    • Method Detail

      • loadCvJSON

        org.json.JSONObject loadCvJSON(String login)
        Loads CV of user associated with given login.
        Parameters:
        login - login of user whom CV should be loaded
        Returns:
        JSON object of users CV, null if CV does not exist

      • loadCvXML

        Document loadCvXML(String login)
        Loads CV of user associated with given login.
        Parameters:
        login - login of user whom CV should be loaded
        Returns:
        DOM of users CV (XML format), null if CV does not exist

      • saveCv

        boolean saveCv(String login,
               org.json.JSONObject cv)
        Stores given CV to database and associates it with given login.
        Parameters:
        login - login of CV to be stored (login has to exist in users' db)
        cv - CV to be stored to database in JSON format
        Returns:
        true if saved, false on error

      • saveCv

        boolean saveCv(String login,
               Document cv)
        Stores given CV to database and associates it with given login.
        Parameters:
        login - login of CV to be stored (login has to exist in users' db)
        cv - CV to be stored to database in XML format
        Returns:
        true if saved, false on error

      • generatePdf

        File generatePdf(String login,
                 String lang)
        Generates pdf of CV associated with given login
        Parameters:
        login - login of user whom CV should be generated
        lang - language to be used in generated pdf
        Returns:
        file containing CV in pdf format of user with given login

      • checkValidity

        String checkValidity(Document cv)
        Checks validity of given DOM (CV in XML format) against defined XML Schema.
        Parameters:
        cv - cv in XML format whose validity should be checked
        Returns:
        message with error, null if ok

      • checkValidity

        String checkValidity(org.json.JSONObject cv)
        Checks validity of given CV in JSON format against defined XML Schema.
        Parameters:
        cv - cv in JSON format whose validity should be checked
        Returns:
        message with error, null if ok
